messages.subject: Re: How a HS Dropout Became the Youngest Boss at Apple - Buccaneer scholar - Gizmodo
messages.msgSnippet: He s participated some in the discussions at the Radical Unschoolers Network ning site http://familyrun.ning.com/ He doesn t think about unschooling the same
messages.messageBody:
He's participated some in the discussions at the Radical Unschoolers Network ning site http://familyrun.ning.com/

He doesn't think about unschooling the same way I do, but that's okay. :) I like his book especially to give to a frustrated schooled teen, or anyone who's damaged by school worship.

Deborah in IL
